s1.title: What, why and when...
s1.p: This is a list of the available jars, what they are, where they come from, and what they do.
s1.note: Required by Core Cocoon column is related to cocoon.jar itself, and not to the whole cocoon.war supplied with the release. If you want to build cocoon.war without any optional library (marked as No), make sure that components dependent on this library (see column Required by Cocoon Component) are not mentioned anywhere in cocoon.xconf and sitemap.xmap files.

tr.td: Part of jakarta-avalon, it is a set of classes and patterns that support high level server development.
Part of jakarta-avalon, it is a set of classes and patterns that support high level server development.
Batik is a Java based toolkit for applications which handle images in the Scalable Vector Graphics (SVG) format for various purposes, such as viewing, generation or manipulation.
Hello World - SVG, SVG Welcome page, etc

The Bean Scripting Framework (BSF) is an architecture for incorporating scripting into, and enabling scripting against, Java applications and applets. Using BSF, an application can use scripting, and become scriptable, against any BSF-supported language. When BSF supports additional languages, the application will automatically support the additional languages.
Dynamic Content - Javascript Generator and Python Generator
I believe that this project is in talks with Apache to be 'adopted'.
Cocoon is a 100% pure Java publishing framework that relies on new W3C technologies (such as XML, XSL, SVG, etc..) to provide web content.

Although the java.net package provides basic support for accessing resources via HTTP, it doesn't provide the full flexibility or functionality needed by many applications. The Jakarta Commons HTTP Client component seeks to fill this void by providing an efficient, up-to-date, and feature-rich package implementing the client side of the most recent HTTP standards and recommendations.

Open Source Delivery Context Java Library supporting CC/PP and UAProf. Different web-enabled devices have different input, output, hardware, software, network and browser capabilities. In order for a web server or web-based application to provide optimized content to different clients it requires a description of the capabilities of the client known as the delivery context.
FOP is a Java application that reads a formatting object tree conforming to the XSL candidate release and then turns it into a PDF document or allows you to preview it directly on screen.
Hello World - PDF, Static content - formatting objects

hsqldb is a relational database engine written in Java, with a JDBC driver, supporting a subset of ANSI-92 SQL. It offers a small, fast database engine which offers both in memory and disk based tables.
Dynamic Content database demos, Sample Forms, Web Applications
Used in the demos to provide a database.
Jena is a java API for manipulating RDF models.
Regexp is a Java Regular Expression package that was graciously donated to the Apache Software Foundation by Jonathan Locke.
DirectoryGenerator ("directory") generator, RegexpURIMatcherFactory ("regexp") matcher, RegexpTargetHostMatcherFactory matcher, AbstractValidatorAction action, LocaleAction action
Sitemap/xsp compilation. Can be replaced by another Java compiler, for example, Jikes.
Jimi is a class library for managing images. Its primary function is image I/O.
This program formats Java code with consistent indentation and so forth, to make it easier to read and maintain.
Sitemap and XSP code formatting, configured in cocoon.xconf
Tidy is a HTML syntax checker and pretty printer.
jakarta-avalon-logkit is a logging toolkit designed for secure performance orientated logging in applications.
jakarta-lucene is a search engine toolkit designed for indexing and searching of documents.
MaybeUpload is a Java language package intended to make it much easier to write Servlets to handle RFC1867 file upload.
File upload capability - very useful in servlet environment.
Entity resolution catalogs - XML Entity and URI Resolvers
Rhino is an implementation of JavaScript in Java.
Velocity is a general purpose template engine written in Java.
Does this jar need to include within it other projects, eg oro and logkit?
Database tailored for the storage of XML data.
Xalan is an XSLT processor that fully supports the W3C specs.
XSL transformations - can be replaced by another XSLT processor.
XML parsing - can be replaced by another XML parser.
JAXP, DOM and SAX interfaces. These are the common interfaces for XML processing.
XT is an implementation in Java of XSLT.
